job_description:
Senior Full Stack Engineer

About the Role:
We're looking for a Senior Full Stack Engineer to join our product team. You'll be responsible for building new features, improving our codebase, and mentoring junior developers.

Requirements:
- 5+ years of software development experience
- Strong React and TypeScript skills
- Experience with Node.js and RESTful APIs
- Familiarity with SQL databases
- Good communication skills

Nice to have:
- Experience with AWS
- GraphQL experience
- Previous startup experience
where_i_dont_fit: GraphQL experience is listed as nice-to-have - I have some experience but it's not my strongest area
what_transfers: Strong React and TypeScript skills from daily use
Extensive Node.js and API development experience
Solid PostgreSQL and SQL database experience
recommendation: This is a strong match for my background. The core requirements align well with my experience. I'd be excited to discuss this further.
opening_paragraph: This role aligns very well with my background. I have deep experience with the core tech stack (React, TypeScript, Node.js) and have been working in similar roles for the past several years.

job_description:
Senior Mobile Engineer

About the Role:
We need a Senior Mobile Engineer to lead our React Native development and build our iOS and Android apps.

Requirements:
- 4+ years React Native experience
- Published apps on App Store and Google Play
- Strong TypeScript skills
- Experience with mobile CI/CD

Nice to have:
- Native iOS or Android experience
- Experience with mobile analytics
where_i_dont_fit: I have no React Native experience
I've never published an app to app stores
No understanding of mobile platform specifics
what_transfers: Strong TypeScript skills from web development
recommendation: I'm not the right person for this role. Mobile development is explicitly a gap in my experience. You need someone who can hit the ground running with React Native.
opening_paragraph: I have to be upfront: mobile development is not my area. This role requires React Native expertise that I simply don't have.
